Uses of Class
coupon.sys.core.beans.Company

  • Packages that use Company 
    Package Description
    coupon.sys.core.dao
    This pachage defines all the Dao (Data Access Object) intefaces for the coupon system.
    coupon.sys.core.dao.db
    This package holds a concrete classes - implementations of all the methods of the abstract classes.
    coupon.sys.core.facade
    This package contains 1 abstract class called "Client Facade" and 3 concrete classes that should have implemented the login method in the ClientFacade class.
    Since the login method was implemented in CompanyDaoDb and in the CustomerDaoDb this class is irrelevant

    • Uses of Company in coupon.sys.core.dao

      Methods in coupon.sys.core.dao that return Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company CompanyDao.getCompany(long id)
      This method return a company object based on the id it gets as a parameter.
      Company CompanyDao.getCompany(java.lang.String name)
      This method return a company object based on the name it gets as a parameter.
      Methods in coupon.sys.core.dao that return types with arguments of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Company> CompanyDao.getAllCompanies()
      This method returns a collection of all the companies.
      Methods in coupon.sys.core.dao with parameters of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CompanyDao.checkDbExistence(Company company)
      This method checks if a company with the same name already exists in the DB.
      void CompanyDao.createCompany(Company company)
      This method insert a new company into the data base (Company table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDao.getCoupons(Company company)
      This method return a collection of all the coupons associated with the company sent as a parameter the method retrieves the information from the db create a collection of all the coupons and return it.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDao.getCouponsByType(Company company, CouponType couponType)
      This method return a collection of coupons based on the type it gets as a parameter Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDao.getCouponsUpToDate(Company company, java.util.Date upToDate)
      This method return a collection of coupons based on the date it gets as a parameter Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDao.getCouponsUpToPrice(Company company, double upToPrice)
      This method return a collection of coupons based on the price it gets as a parameter Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
      void CompanyDao.removeCompany(Company company)
      This method delete a company from the data base.
      void CompanyDao.updateCompany(Company company)
      This method update the information of a company.
